message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking of something a bit more reasonable. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12000?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13500. This is my final offer, so I hope you can work with me on this.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12500?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in this product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13000. This is my last offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12000?
